mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note(notecontent_no, member_no, counterpart_no, counterpart_nickname, sendrecieve) VALUES(#{notecontent_no}, #{member_no}, #{counterpart_no}, #{counterpart_nickname}, #{sendrecieve_member})
